ovdesc.p: The AC.CASH.POOL.LINK file is maintained by AC.CASH.POOL (used to record 'rules' which will be checked against to see if a transfer of funds needs to be made from one account to another). This file record each individual rule and details the amounts and frequency dates.
Since the System maintains this file it there is no user intervention. All changes are made on the AC.CASH.POOL record.

desc.p: The record id of the AC.CASH.POOL.LINK is a standard T24 transaction reference type. It is created by the system when the AC.CASH.POOL record is authorised.
System maintained
